mapper.select: SELECT STOCK_CODE FROM TB_PORTFOLIO_CORP WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{curUserId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PORTFOLIO_CORP ( CORP_CODE, USER_ID, CORP_NAME, STOCK_CODE, GUBN, CREATE_ID,CREATE_DT,CHANGE_ID,CHANGE_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT CORP_CODE FROM TB_BPLC_DETAIL WHERE STOCK_CODE = #{pStockCode}), #{curUserId}, (SELECT STOCK_NAME FROM TB_BPLC_DETAIL WHERE STOCK_CODE = #{pStockCode}), #{pStockCode}, '', #{curUserId} ,SYSDATE ,#{curUserId} ,SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT a.corp_code AS "corpCode", a.user_id AS "userId", a.corp_name AS "corpName", a.stock_code AS "stockCode", a.create_id AS "createId", a.create_dt AS "createDt", a.change_id AS "changeId", a.change_dt AS "changeDt", a.hold_quantity AS "holdQuantity", a.avg_price AS "avgPrice", TO_NUMBER(a.bef_cls_price) AS "befClsPrice", decode(a.hold_quantity, 0, 0,(a.bef_cls_price - a.avg_price)) AS "valPrice", SUM(nvl(b.return_amount,0)) AS "returnAmount" FROM ( SELECT corp_code,user_id,corp_name,stock_code,create_id,create_dt,change_id,change_dt, nvl(hold_quantity, 0) AS hold_quantity, nvl(round(avg_price, 0), 0) AS avg_price, nvl(( SELECT bef_cls_price FROM tb_bplc_detail WHERE stock_code = a.stock_code ), 0) AS bef_cls_price FROM tb_portfolio_corp a WHERE 1 = 1 AND user_id = #{curUserId} ) a, tb_portfolio_corp_detail b WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.corp_code = b.corp_code (+) AND a.user_id = b.user_id (+) GROUP BY a.corp_code, a.user_id, a.corp_name, a.stock_code, a.create_id, a.create_dt, a.change_id, a.change_dt, a.hold_quantity, a.avg_price, a.bef_cls_price ORDER BY corp_name
